content.rendered:
Directed by David Boyd. Allison Liddi-Brown. Jaffar Mahmood. Clement Virgo. Fisher Stevens.

Written by Jason Katims. Jason Katims. Ann Napolitano. Megan Chan Meinero. Megan Chan Meinero. Rajiv Joseph. Rajiv Joseph. LaDarian Smith. LaDarian Smith. Romi Barta. Halley Feiffer. Louisa Hill. Michelle Lirtzman.

Cast Colin O’Brien (Edward 1). Carter Hudson (John 1). Amy Forsyth (Linda 1). Maxwell Jenkins (Jordan 1). Connie Britton (Dee Dee 1). Eva Ariel Binder (Shay). Khloe Bruno (Becks). Anna Uzele (Adriana). Idris Debrand (Kojo). Audrey Corsa (Zoe). Brittany S. Hall (Amanda). Jenna Qureshi (Mahira). Dario Ladani Sanchez (Sam). Ivan Shaw (Steve). Douglas M. Griffin (Milo). Ted Koch (Charles). Joshua Echebiri (Reverend Eric). Jasmin/Ep Walker (Natalie). Clara Wong (Daphne). Brian d’Arcy James (Bruce). Joe Tippett (County Rescue). James Chen (Brent). Shamika Cotton (Cora Richardson). Johnny Link (Gary). Trent M. Williams (Vernon). Amr El-Bayoumi (Faakhir). Robin Tunney (Jane). Hannah Jane McMurray (Noelle). Ashley De La Rosa (Sienna). Chris Giarmo (Ticket Taker). Stefan Holdbrook (Isaac). Mahadeo Shivraj (Mahira’s Uncle). Adrian Matilla (Xavier). Christopher Riley (Young Eddie). Vanessa Huszar (Geena). Roger Yawson (Albert). Zachary Greenstein (4 year old Eddie). Judy Kuhn (Greg’s Mom). Lynda Gravatt (Congresswoman Rose Washington).

Language English.

Producers David Boyd. Lori Keith Douglas. Jason Katims. LaDarian Smith. Jonathan Jennings. Locke Alexander. Vincent Morano. Jeni Mulein. Ann Napolitano. Patrick Ward. Romi Barta. Halley Feiffer. Louisa Hill. Rajiv Joseph. Michelle Lirtzman. Fisher Stevens. –

Production Apple Studios. True Jack Productions.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status On Going (2023–)
